TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InlineCollection extends System.Windows.Documents.TextElementCollection`1<class System.Windows.Documents.Inline> implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList

Docs.summary: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Inline"> elements. InlineCollection defines the allowable child content of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Span>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks InlineCollection creation is only permitted inside an element that owns an InlineCollection, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> or a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph>. As such, an InlineCollection cannot be instantiated directly and has no default or overloaded constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Add(string text) cil managed

Docs.param: Text set as the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Run.Text%2A> property for the implicit <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Run>.
Docs.summary: Adds an implicit <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Run"> element with the given text, supplied as a <xref:System.String>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Add(class System.Windows.UIElement uiElement) cil managed

Docs.param: <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement"> set as the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer.Child%2A> property for the implicit <xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer>.
Docs.summary: Adds an implicit <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer"> with the supplied <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> already in it.
Gets the first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Inline"> element within this instance of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection>.
Docs.value: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Inline"> element within this instance of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection>.

Docs.summary: Gets the last <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Inline"> element within this instance of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection>.
Docs.value: The last <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Inline"> element within this instance of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection>.
